content:
joseph RyanApril  

Keith Sanders executive director of the Illinois Board of Higher Education will talk with the Faculty Senate at Tuesdays meeting PERIOD



The Faculty Senate will meet at  p.m PERIOD in the Journalism Lounge in Buzzard Hall PERIOD

There is no set topic agenda for conversation but generally people are interested in legislative issues as far as the budget webbased education and the state funding of private institutions said Faculty Senate Chair James Tidwell journalism professor PERIOD

The senate also will announce the election results of last weeks faculty elections for university committees and councils PERIOD Faculty elections took place last Wednesday and Thursday for positions on  different committees and councils which included Faculty Senate and the Council on Academic Affairs PERIOD

The announcements and Sanders will be the two biggies for the meeting Tidwell said PERIOD Due to those two things we will have limited other business. however the senate will seek faculty who wish to be appointed to various campus committees and councils that are appointed as opposed to elected PERIOD For a detailed list faculty can visit the faculty senate Web site and interested faculty should contact Gary Canivez psychology professor PERIOD

Open positions are available on the Council of Faculty Research Judicial Board Library Advisory Board Parking Advisory Committee Parking Appeals Committee Publications Board RadioTelevision Center Board Textbook Rental Advisory Committee and the Enrollment Management Advisory Committee among others PERIOD
